course.title: MAT 3120 Real Analysis (3 units)
course.desc: Metric spaces, continuous functions. Compactness and connectedness. Contraction mappings. The inverse function theorem and the implicit function theorem. Series of functions; modes of convergence, power series, Fourier series. Topics on function spaces such as: Weierstrass approximation, L¢2 spaces.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: (MAT 2122, MAT 2125) or (MAT 2120, MAT 2121).
